description: Test cases for edge cases, error handling, and boundary conditions

test_cases.name: Session Full - Cannot Join
test_cases.expected_result: Join button disabled or error message shown

test_cases.name: Session Cancelled After Join
test_cases.expected_result: User notified of cancellation, session shows cancelled status

test_cases.name: Network Disconnection During Booking
test_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed, booking not partially completed

test_cases.name: Venue Becomes Unavailable During Selection
test_cases.expected_result: Error message, slot marked unavailable, refresh options shown

test_cases.name: Double Join Prevention
preconditions: User has already joined a session
test_cases.expected_result: Message indicates already joined, or Leave option shown instead

test_cases.name: Location Services Disabled
test_cases.expected_result: Prompt to enable location, or show all sessions without distance

test_cases.name: No Sessions Within Radius
preconditions: User in area with no sessions
test_cases.expected_result: Empty state message encouraging user to propose session

test_cases.name: Session Time Passed
test_cases.expected_result: Session marked as past/completed, join disabled

test_cases.name: Payment Timeout
steps: Wait for payment deadline to expire
test_cases.expected_result: User removed from session or notified of spot release

test_cases.name: Host Leaves Own Session
preconditions: User is host of a session
test_cases.expected_result: Warning about session cancellation or host transfer required

test_cases.name: Maximum Players Exceeded
steps: Attempt to add more players via invite

test_cases.name: Special Characters in Chat
steps: Send message with special characters and emojis
test_cases.expected_result: Message displays correctly with all characters preserved

test_cases.name: Concurrent Booking Conflict
preconditions: Two hosts try to book same slot
steps: Both hosts select same venue and time
test_cases.expected_result: One booking succeeds, other receives conflict error

test_cases.name: Session Token Expiry
test_cases.expected_result: User redirected to login with appropriate message
